events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection causing moderate damage to the vehicle.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the customer's description and keywords provided.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to manage and follow up on this case.
Customer received acknowledgment of the claim submission and was informed about the next steps.
The agent requested the police report, photos of the damage, and repair estimates from the customer.
The customer submitted all the required documents including the police report and vehicle repair estimates.
Investigation commenced to verify the details of the accident and assess liability and damage extent.
Investigation findings confirmed the customer's account and the extent of damage to the vehicle.
A settlement offer was prepared based on repair costs and coverage limits and sent to the customer.
Customer responded positively, agreeing to the settlement offer and thanking the agent for prompt service.
The claim was formally approved by the claims supervisor after all conditions were met.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and transferred to the customer's account.
The claim was closed following completion of payment and confirmation from the customer about the resolution.
